suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.5).
suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.skytells/console: Required to use the database commands (1.*).
suggest.skytells/events: Required to use the observers with Eloquent (1.*).
suggest.skytells/pagination: Required to paginate the result set (1.*).
